attributes.action: Investigate East Midlands Trains, the Liverpool to Norwich line rail ranchise operator, for failing services
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We support the Government's ambitions to improve public transport and are frutrated East Midlands Trains for  regularly turning passengers into sardines by sending two carriage trains when it should send four. The ‘half size’ trains result in severe overcrowding across the country with many passengers not able to get on trains, making them late for work, and people with guide dogs left stranded because the RSPCA advise animals should not travel in such conditions.

We are frustrated with the inability of anyone to sort the problem, poor communication, and a lack of respect.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Investigate East Midlands Trains, the Liverpool to Norwich line rail ranchise operator, for failing services"

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page18849


Prime Minister's Office
